page.title: 08FARMS OF ALRESFORD
page.content: {Folly Farm:} Grows barley and also wheat and pasture. The best barley goes for brewing. {Manor Farm:}400 acres of which 100 are used for grazing. The farm has been run by the same family for 60 years; there are 4 farm workers. The crops are wheat,barley and watercress. They have a dairy and 95 Friesian cows. {Fobdown Farm:}Has 9 arable and 5 pasture fields with 2 other fields set aside for the farmer's horses.There are 'free range' hens and a large dairy herd.{Pinglestone Farm} is a part of Fobdown Farm. {Upton Park Farm:}Barley and wheat are the main crops,but also pasture for a 90 cow herd and 40 heifers. The farm employs 9;from 7-30 a.m. to 5 p.m.,with 15 mins.for breakfast and an hour for lunch 5 days a week.
